text: "The Deer & the Wolf" is a song by English recording artist Sophie Ellis- Bextor from her fifth studio album Wanderlust (2014). The song was released as the fourth and final single of the album on 25 August 2014. It was co-written by Ed Harcourt and Ellis-Bextor; whilst production was handled by the former. It was remixed under the name of "The Deer & The Wolf (Role Reversal)" for the Wandermix edition of the album. The music video for the song was directed by Harry Cauty of Kode Media, and features Ellis-Bextor performing the song in a forest set with her band. One month later Sophie uploaded on her official YouTube account an acoustic version of the song, played with the whole band lying on a bed. ==Track listing== ;Promotional CD single Details adapted from the liner notes of "The Deer & the Wolf"'s CD single. # "The Deer & the Wolf" (Radio edit) – ==Release history== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" ! scope="col"| Region ! scope="col"| Date ! scope="col"| Format ! scope="col"| Label |- ! scope="row"| Worldwide | 25 August 2014 | | EBGB's |} ==References== Category:2014 singles Category:2014 songs Category:Sophie Ellis-Bextor songs Category:Songs written by Ed Harcourt Category:Songs written by Sophie Ellis-Bextor
title: The Deer & the Wolf
